mainText: There may never be a human being as creative or driven as Steve. He helped reform the way we view technology in society. Before Steve a phone was just a phone. Now phones are far more than just devices to call other individuals by. Without Steve computers would not be where they are today on the consumer market if it were not for the Mac computer. Even at this moment I am typing on a Macbook Pro. We will all miss you and we all love you dearly.
author: Mike
